name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook mitigates incidents involving execution of malicious scripts that attempt to extract sensitive data.

action--e61e57d9-9e05-4b54-bb81-d1d425a4.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--e61e57d9-9e05-4b54-bb81-d1d425a4.description: Terminate any PowerShell processes that could be executing malicious scripts.

action--db35879e-d8c3-4b66-a6fa-f9d7c71b.name: Isolate affected host from the network
action--db35879e-d8c3-4b66-a6fa-f9d7c71b.description: Disconnect the compromised host from the network to prevent further data exfiltration.

action--19b849b4-c08d-4875-8f0c-ebc457b3.name: Perform malware scan on affected systems
action--19b849b4-c08d-4875-8f0c-ebc457b3.description: Conduct a malware scan on the affected host to identify malicious artifacts.

commands.command: for i in {1..3}; do scan_tool --target host-22; done

action--f0e9da6f-dd49-4d1f-87b1-305f1cfb.name: Change passwords for all compromised accounts
action--f0e9da6f-dd49-4d1f-87b1-305f1cfb.description: Reset passwords for all accounts that may have been compromised.

action--b3d4e70b-4f35-4398-9c73-def20f67.name: Monitor network traffic for suspicious behavior
action--b3d4e70b-4f35-4398-9c73-def20f67.description: Continuously monitor network traffic for any unusual activities.
